member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewContainer.DeferredLoading
member.summary: This property determines if the control will load only upon the first time it is focused upon, as opposed to being pre-loaded on the server. If this property is set to True, instead of rendering any content upon its initial load, it will simply emit a small client side element that when first focused on, will create an inline frame to display the view.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewContainer
member.summary: Aptify Generic View Container - this ASP.NET Server control will display a view of any type based on the View ID specified.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.ViewTypeScope
member.summary: Determines if the view type is available to all entities or only for a specific entity or set of entities.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.ViewTypeInfo
member.summary: ViewTypeInfo provides information about specific view types as well as access to extended GE object creation as needed by the application code using it.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.DeferredLoading
member.summary: This property determines if the control will load only upon the first time it is focused upon, as opposed to being pre-loaded on the server. If this property is set to True, instead of rendering any content upon its initial load, it will simply emit a small client side element that when first focused on, will create an inline frame to display the view.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.FillWidth
member.summary: Determines if the control will fill the parent container's width at run time on the client-side (done via client-side Java Script). Maps to the fillWidth run-time HTML element attribute.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.FillHeightMargin
member.summary: This property is only used if FillHeight is set to True. If FillHeight is set to True, this property determines the margin to use on the bottom side of the control when filling the container's height. This property specifies the number of pixels of space to be left on the bottom side of the control between the control's edge and the container's edge.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.FillWidthMargin
member.summary: This property is only used if FillWidth is set to True. If FillWidth is set to True, this property determines the margin to use on the right side of the control when filling the container's width. This property specifies the number of pixels of space to be left on the right side of the control between the control's edge and the container's edge.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.FillHeight
member.summary: Determines if the control will fill the parent container's height at run time on the client-side (done via client-side Java Script). Maps to the fillHeight run-time HTML element attribute.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.FillIgnoreChildren
member.summary: Determines if the control's children will be evaluated for resizing or not. The default value for this property is True, which results in the children of the control NOT being evaluated for resizing. Sub-classes can override this as required, as can individual instances of the class being used at run-time or design-time. It is important to leave this property set to True as much as possible as it reduces run-time resizing overhead.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.ErrorLabel
member.summary: This label is an internal feature of the base class that can be used by sub-classes to display error messages to the user when required. Set the ErrorLabel.Visible = True first, and then set the ErrorLabel.Text to the appropriate message for the user.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.ViewSQL
member.summary: View SQL

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.FilterSQL
member.summary: Additional Filter SQL for the Where Clause - used with ViewID based views

member.summary: Aptify View ID (Record ID in Views entity)

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.EntityName
member.summary: Returns the name of the entity specified by the EntityID property

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.EntityID
member.summary: Aptify EntityID associated with this view

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebViewPlugInBase.GetUserCredentialsFromSession
member.summary: Returns a User Credentials object from the Session State, if available. This is used when ViewState is not yet recreated, or during Callback when ViewState is unavailable
